text: Mekeme Tamla Ladji, simply known as Zito, (born 19 September 1985) is an Ivorian footballer. Currently, he plays for Levadiakos. Tamla previously played for K.S.K. Beveren in the Belgian First Division and for Le Mans in Ligue 2. ==References== Category:1985 births Category:Living people Category:Ivorian footballers Category:K.S.K. title: Mekeme Tamla Ladji
